commit_list.message:
Fix issue with null segments

Signed-off-by: Michael D. Ivey <ivey@gweezlebur.com>
[#365 state:resolved]
I was going to change this to use explicit returns, but I think the more
common case is for segments() to be non-nil so this is better.

commit_list.message:
Handle IPv6 only in gethostbyname spec

The gethostbyname spec was altered to test for the address type (IPv6 / IPv4)
and look for the proper loopback address in each address type (127.0.0.1 or ::1)

commit_list.message:
Patch dir/shared/pwd test to work in OS/X case insensitive

The test was comparing file names rather than files and so case
differences between the file system and the command line were
making the test fail.

commit_list.message:
Convert partials to components, and move templates to addon

This converts all partials to components, requiring that some data be passed from the previously shared component to the control view and label cmponents used for each control.  In addition Ember 1.11 attribute syntax is now used, and all templates are in the addon directory and incorporated as layout for each component removing any use of the deprecated layoutName.

commit_list.message:
Updates to address create/delete submission and asset

Create/Delete of submissions and assets are stable.
The delete button for assets and submissions were rendered to the same place making it imposible to delete assets alone.  They are moved to separate locations, but will need designer attention to resolve properly.
Resolved errors with server responses and formatting.
commit_list.repo_description: 8th Mind Content Portal

commit_list.message:
Copy RDS changes from bitbucket and resolve login issue

RDS configuration changes moved from bitbucket and source verified to match starting point in github.

Issue with subscribe resolved in manual testing of register.
commit_list.repo_description: 8th Mind Content Portal

commit_list.message:
Resolve issues with submission creation errors

Submission creation errors were not being handled and messages not displayed to the user.  Now errors are detected, and saved to the component and a rough display of messages has been added to the template.

Also, resolved some server issues with parameters being out of range.
commit_list.repo_description: 8th Mind Content Portal

commit_list.message:
Submission create with asset and delete mostly working

Delete has an open issue that you need to delete the assets before deleting the submission.  Currently the delete button attempts to delete the submission witch is disallowed if there are assets.
